20110101061016.000|20110101061017.000|CC1|PEOPLE SEEM TO SHOOT THEIR GUNS 
20110101061017.000|20110101061020.000|CC1|UP TO THE AIR. "THE PUBLIC COMES

20110101061028.000|20110101061032.000|CC1|SHOOTER WITHIN SECONDS. "

20110101061034.000|20110101061036.000|CC1|GUN IN THE STREET IS VERY
